TopicTitle: Apoapsis and Periapsis Quick Warp Buttons

Articles.Content: It would be nice to have a quick button in either the map or flight view that allows you to quickly warp to the next apoapsis or periapsis. It feels clunky and inaccurate to try and click where you think it will be on your trajectory. It would be nice to have the game automatically take you as close to that point as possible with just a button click. Moving to apoapsis and periapsis is such a common maneuver that having an easy "Warp to Periapsis" or "Warp to Apoapsis"  function would be a great time saver and QoL feature.
